article_title: Will Tax Inversions Sink The U.S. Economy?

article_metadata.author: Mike Patton

og.description: Much has been said about corporate tax inversions lately. Are they good or are they a destructive force? Will they sink the U.S. economy as some have suggested?
og.title: Will Tax Inversions Sink The U.S. Economy?
